3166-2 | blank1_info = MX-TAB | blank2_name = Postal abbr. | blank2_info = Tab. | blank3_name = | blank3_info = | website = Tabasco State Government | footnotes = | name = }} Tabasco is a state in southeast Mexico, on the Gulf of Mexico. About 2,000,000 people live there. Its capital is called Villahermosa.
